OrderType Enum¶

Concepts¶

To prevent errors in sending orders the OrderType enum provides a safer way to interact with order types provided by Stockfighter. The order types themselves can be found in the API documentation.

Docs¶

class stockfighter.OrderType¶

Enum for expressing OrderType. Will convert to str when printing or communicating with Stockfighter.

fok = <OrderType.fok: 3>¶
ioc = <OrderType.ioc: 4>¶
limit = <OrderType.limit: 2>¶
market = <OrderType.market: 1>¶
